mapper.sql: ATTENDANCE_ID, STAFF_ID, ATTENDANCE_TIME, ATTENDANCE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into attendance_table (ATTENDANCE_ID, STAFF_ID, ATTENDANCE_TIME, ATTENDANCE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, STATUS) values (#{attendanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attendanceTime,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTypeHandler}, #{attendanceStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update attendance_table
STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ATTENDANCE_TIME = #{attendanceTime,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTypeHandler},
ATTENDANCE_STATUS = #{attendanceStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ATTENDANCE_ID = #{attendanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update attendance_table set STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ATTENDANCE_TIME = #{attendanceTime,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTypeHandler}, ATTENDANCE_STATUS = #{attendanceStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where ATTENDANCE_ID = #{attendanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
